thread.title: Museum apologises for using foreign model for Indian M'sians
thread.title_full: Museum apologises for using foreign model for Indian M'sians

title: Museum apologises for using foreign model for Indian M'sians
text:
More 
Muzium Negara has apologised for using a cutout of a foreign male model, whose image is believed to have been sourced from the internet, to represent Indian Malaysians. 
The picture of the man appeared in the "Malaysia Today" section of the museum which showcases different eras. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
